General.Name: BlueFocus Communication Group
General.Description: BlueFocus Intelligent Communications Group Co., Ltd. provides marketing and brand management services in China and internationally. It offers full-case promotion services including digital marketing, public relations, event management, etc.; and full-case advertising agency services, such as digital, overseas, smart TV advertising, OTT business agency services, etc. The company also engages in metaverse businesses, which include virtual people, objects, and space. It serves various industries, which include gaming, automobiles, Internet and applications, e-commerce, high-tech products, consumer goods, real estate, and finance. The company was formerly known as BlueFocus Communication Group Co., Ltd. and changed its name to BlueFocus Intelligent Communications Group Co., Ltd. in June 2018. BlueFocus Intelligent Communications Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

3.Name: Mr. Feng  Qin
3.Title: Deputy GM & Sec. of the Board
